tool.name: LXMLExport
tool.displayname: Export Graded Raster Surface to LandXML

param.name: demInput
param.dialogReference: Raster dataset that represents the graded surface (not complied with the existing surface)

param.name: demExist
param.dialogReference: Raster dataset that represents the existing surface

param.name: pileOption
param.displayname: Use pile elevations as reference points?
param.dialogReference: An option that will allow for piles with a graded elevation field to be used as reference points for the LandXML

param.name: pilesInput
param.dialogReference: Point layer that defines the piles in each row with a graded elevation field

param.name: gradeField
param.dialogReference: Graded elevation field in the pile feature class

param.name: boundOption
param.dialogReference: An option that will allow for a polygon describing the grading boundary to be used as reference for the LandXML

param.name: gradeBounds
param.dialogReference: Polygon layer that defines the grading boundaries

param.name: out_xml
param.dialogReference: File path and name for the output LandXML

tool.summary: Exports a graded raster surface to a LandXML. Piles with a graded elevation field and grading boundaries can be used to make the output more precise at the pile locations.

idCitation.resTitle: Export Graded Raster Surface to LandXML
